img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/42/Wukong_LowerHollow_8.jpg)
The area is chock-full of various plants to harvest, but you'll also find a bunch of Beetle Captains who appear to be doing the same. Since many of them have their backs turned as they scavenge, be sure to sneak up and charge up your focus points to deliver a big heavy attack.
img_below_text:
Off on the right side, there's a larger tree where you can find a **Luojia Fragrant Vine** above a pool of water, and then find a path leading up to the left.
Relief of the Fallen Loong Luojia Fragrant Vine

img_summary: The image depicts a player character from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" engaged in combat with a large, beetle-like enemy in a lush, green environment. The preceding text suggests that the area is rich in plants to harvest and is populated by Beetle Captains, which the player can sneak up on for a surprise attack. The following text indicates that nearby, there is a larger tree with a **Luojia Fragrant Vine** above a pool of water, hinting at an important item or objective in the vicinity. The image serves to illustrate the intense combat encounters and the exploration elements within the game.
